page.title: 07EDUCATION IN ALVA
page.content: There are three{schools}in our section. Tillicoultry Primary has 515 pupils and hopes to move soon to a site at Fir Park. Alva Primary is in Brook Street it has 480 children. An unusual feature is the brook which runs through the school grounds. 1178 pupils go to{Alva Academy. Children from Menstrie,Tillicoultry, Dollar and other local towns as well as Alva all go there. The Johnstone Park is used as the school's{sports {field,}which is marked with a running track,long jump pit and football pitch. Alva Primary also has the use of a playing field with 2 football pitches.
